Name: Truzzle
About the game: Take the ball from start to finish without interruptions. Inspired by classic games, Truzzle offers an objective, enjoyable and challenging puzzle experience. To reach your destination, use board resources such as spins, moving parts, teleports, and so on. 80+ handmade levels, with increasing difficulty. Original music to help you focus and relax.
